description:
★ ★ ★ ★ ★  WAGmob: Over 300,000 paying customers from 175+ countries. ★ ★ ★ ★ ★

WAGmob brings you a Simple 'n Easy on-the-go learning app for Learn Word 101. The app helps you understand the basics in a nice and organized manner. Features include tutorials, quizzes, flashcards and more.

App is continuously updated based on your feedback. Your 100% satisfaction is guaranteed.

App tools include search feature.



Includes following tutorials:

Introduction,
Word Layout,
Getting Started I,
Getting Started II,
Modifying Page Layout,
Text Basics,
Formatting,
The Ribbon I,
The Ribbon II,
The Ribbon III,
The Ribbon IV,
The Ribbon V,
The Ribbon VI,
The Ribbon VII,
Checking Spelling and Grammar,
Creating Hyperlink,
Working with Shapes I,
Working with Shapes II,
Mail Merge I,
Mail Merge II,
Setting a Password,
Printing,
Word Keyboard Shortcuts I,
Word Keyboard Shortcuts II,
Word Keyboard Shortcuts III,
Compatibility Mode.

Includes following quizzes:

Quiz on Basics,
Quiz on Ribbon,
Quiz on Keyboard Shortcuts.]

What is unique about WAGmob apps?

1) A companion app for on-the-go, bite-sized learning.

2) Offers value for money (a lifetime of free updates).

3) Over 300,000 paying customers from 175+ countries.


Our Vision: Provide simple ‘n easy apps for on-the-go learning.

Our Mission: A WAGmob app in every pocket.

Please write to us Team@WAGmob.com. We would love to improve this app.
